abstract: Chicago Mayor Rahm Emanuel, in essay appearing on The Chicago Sun-Times website,  says he intends to replace Independent Police Review Authority, which was assigned to investigate alleged police misconduct, with civilian investigative agency; states his intention to create inspector general position to oversee public safety, as well as oversight board.

headline.print_headline: Chicago Mayor Looks to Replace Panel That Reviews Police Conduct
headline.main: Chicago Mayor Looks to Replace Agency That Reviews Police Conduct

snippet: Rahm Emanuel’s new plan follows a task force’s blistering report, which said the force falls short on matters of race, transparency and accountability.
lead_paragraph: Rahm Emanuel’s new plan follows a task force’s blistering report, which said the force falls short on matters of race, transparency and accountability.
